mentions.context: Komadu captures provenance data generated by workflows running on multiple data processing systems.

ProvLake has a microservices architecture composed of three services (ProvCapturer, ProvManager, and PolyProvQueryEngine), a lightweight ProvLake library, a messaging system, and the PLView (Figure 2).
ProvLake provides a lightweight library to be imported into the workflows (clients), which adds little code for instrumentation; thus, avoiding significant pollution in the original workflows' code.
